text: Franck Riester (born 3 January 1974) is a French politician. He is the current French Minister of Culture. He was a member of the National Assembly of France from 2007 to 2018. He represented the Seine-et-Marne department, and is a former member of The Republicans, formerly known as the Union for a Popular Movement. He founded and currently leads the Agir party. In March 2020 during the coronavirus outbreak Riester tested positive for COVID-19. He is a homosexual. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:French LGBT people Category:French mayors Category:Gay men Category:Government ministers of France Category:LGBT politicians Category:Politicians from Paris
title: Franck Riester
